Name: heat production, natural gas, at diffusion absorption heat pump 4kW, future | heat, future | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply
Description: Diffusion absorption heat pump with 4 kWth nominal thermal power connected to a short borehole heat exchanger. The unit includes a peak load boiler which allows a maximal output power of 11 kWth. Operation with connection to low pressure gas network. Seasonal performance factor (SPF) of 1.32.
